name: npc_dota_hero_juggernaut
bio_loc: No one has ever seen the face hidden beneath the mask of Yurnero the Juggernaut. It is only speculation that he even has one. For defying a corrupt lord, Yurnero was exiled from the ancient Isle of Masks--a punishment that saved his life. The isle soon after vanished beneath the waves in a night of vengeful magic. He alone remains to carry on the Isle's long Juggernaut tradition, one of ritual and swordplay. The last practitioner of the art, Yurnero's confidence and courage are the result of endless practice; his inventive bladework proves that he has never stopped challenging himself. Still, his motives are as unreadable as his expression. For a hero who has lost everything twice over, he fights as if victory is a foregone conclusion.
hype_loc: In a flurry of slashes, Juggernaut cuts down his foes. Sprinting and spinning into battle with reckless abandon, and nearly invincible once he is able to begin his assault, stopping Juggernaut can often be just as difficult as surviving him.
npe_desc_loc: Slices through his enemies with precise strikes

facets.description_loc: Blade Fury can now critically strike based on the level of Blade Dance.
facets.name: juggernaut_bladestorm

facets.description_loc: Juggernaut gains Agility and Movement Speed as long as he's not taking damage.
facets.name: juggernaut_agigain

abilities.name: juggernaut_blade_fury
abilities.desc_loc: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%%, and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Juggernaut deals damage in an interval equal to %blade_fury_aspd_multiplier%x his attack speed. Applies a strong dispel at the end of the spin.
abilities.lore_loc: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
notes_loc: You can use items during Blade Fury.
Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases Blade Fury radius, and slows enemies by %bonus_movement_slow%%%.
facets_loc: Blade Fury can now critically strike based on the level of Blade Dance.

abilities.name: juggernaut_healing_ward
abilities.desc_loc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at %healing_ward_movespeed_tooltip% movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
notes_loc: The Healing Ward can be controlled.
Multiple Healing Wards do not stack.

abilities.name: juggernaut_blade_dance
abilities.desc_loc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
abilities.lore_loc: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

abilities.name: juggernaut_swift_slash
abilities.desc_loc: Performs a short Omnislash for %duration% seconds.

abilities.name: juggernaut_duelist
abilities.desc_loc: Juggernaut deals %front_damage_increase%%% more damage to targets that are facing him. Damage bonus always applies during Omnislash.

abilities.name: juggernaut_omni_slash
abilities.desc_loc:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
notes_loc: You can use items during Omnislash.

abilities.name: juggernaut_bladeform
abilities.desc_loc: Juggernaut gains Agility and Movement Speed as long as he's not taking damage.
notes_loc: Grants a stack of Bladeform every %stack_gain_time%s that Juggernaut does not take damage. Each stack grants %agi_bonus_pct_per_stack%%% base agility bonus and %movement_speed_pct_per_stack%%% movement speed with a max of %max_stacks% stacks. Stacks fade after %linger_duration%s upon taking any damage.
Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks.
